text.text: The property is 86% leased to a premier mix of national and regional tenants, including Safeway, Shoppers Drug Mart, and Dollar Tree, which provide essential service grocery and drug retail offerings. The remaining tenants provide shoppers with other complementary uses including casual dining, health and medical, financial services, electronics, food services, and more. Combined with a weighted average lease to expiry (WALE) of 3.94 years, the property offers investors a strong tenant profile and income stability.
